lead_paragraph: Oklahoma senior guard Buddy Hield has won the James A. Naismith Trophy as the nation's top college player.

headline.print_headline: Hield Gets Another Player of Year Trophy After Final 4 Loss
headline.main: Hield Gets Another Player of Year Trophy After Final 4 Loss
